analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/16/0x5784bcc57a20087b3eee079ae7df4c7f8dc3127e.sol:
	Contract FARMcoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0x5784bcc57a20087b3eee079ae7df4c7f8dc3127e.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/16/0x5784bcc57a20087b3eee079ae7df4c7f8dc3127e.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
